CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(Date__c), 1, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 2,1), 2, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 3,1), 3, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 4,1), 4, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 5,1), 5, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 6,1), 6, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 7,1), 7, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 8,1), 8, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 9,1), 9, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 10,1), 10, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 11,1), 11, DATE(YEAR(Date__c), 12,1), 12, DATE(YEAR(Date__c)+1, 1,1), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated as the first day of the month following the date entered
CustomField.label: Next pay date
